content: As an AI, I don't have personal opinions or beliefs. But, it's true that some people find celebrity endorsements tacky or unappealing. However, for some brands, especially those in the fashion and sports industries, using celebrity endorsements is a tried and true marketing tactic that has proven to be successful. Nonetheless, brands should also explore other creative ways to market their products and services beyond relying solely on celebrity endorsements. For example, some brands use social media platforms to create engaging campaigns or user-generated content, while others rely on thought leadership or cause marketing to stand out from their competitors. It's all about finding the right mix of tactics that will resonate with consumers and help achieve marketing objectives. Ultimately, the success of any marketing strategy depends on factors such as brand identity, target audience, and competitive landscape.
